en.text: Please charge my card for the amount currently owed and to be the card on file for all future payments. I agree to the SiriusXM Canada Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy. I agree that my service will continue and that my credit card will be charged the then-applicable regular price until I cancel. (Regular price subject to change upon proper notice.) Fees and taxes extra. I acknowledge that I can cancel anytime and may call SiriusXM Canada at 1-888-539-7474 to cancel my subscription(s). I understand that if I cancel or terminate my subscription during the first {{ etfTerm }} months, I will be charged a ${{ etf }} EARLY TERMINATION FEE. I agree that all programming is subject to change.
en.text_QUEBEC: Please charge my card for the amount currently owed and to be the card on file for all future payments. I agree to the SiriusXM Canada Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy. I agree that my service will continue and that my credit card will be charged the then-applicable regular rate until I cancel. (Regular rate subject to change upon proper notice.) Taxes extra. Services are provided to me for an indeterminate term and billed to me for the agreed-upon billing period. I acknowledge that I can cancel anytime and may call SiriusXM Canada at 1-888-539-7474 to cancel my subscription(s). I agree that all programming is subject to change.

en.text: Please charge my card for the amount currently due and the card on file for all future payments. By clicking “Complete My Order” I agree: (i) to the SiriusXM Canada Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy; (ii) to receive account notifications at the email address provided; AND (iii) that my service will automatically continue and that my credit card will be charged the then-applicable regular price until I cancel. Regular price subject to change upon proper notice. Fees and taxes extra. I acknowledge that I can cancel anytime and may call SiriusXM Canada at 1-888-539-7474 to cancel my subscription(s). I agree that all programming is subject to change. I understand that my Platinum VIP subscription will continue as long as there is at least one active radio on this plan.
en.text_QUEBEC: Please charge my card for the amount currently due and the card on file for all future payments. By clicking “Complete My Order” I agree: (i) to the SiriusXM Canada Customer Agreement and Privacy Policy; (ii) to receive account notifications at the email address provided; AND (iii) that my service will automatically continue and that my credit card will be charged the then-applicable regular price until I cancel. Regular price subject to change upon proper notice. Taxes extra. I acknowledge that I can cancel anytime and may call SiriusXM Canada at 1-888-539-7474 to cancel my subscription(s). I agree that all programming is subject to change. Services are provided to me for an indeterminate term and billed to me for the agreed-upon billing period. I understand that my Platinum VIP subscription will continue as long as there is at least one active radio on this plan.
